data.meta_description:
71 likes, 4 comments - blackstonepublishing on December 28, 2023: "üöÄ Get ready for a thrilling journey back to the future! The groundbreaking and controversial science fiction book, DANGEROUS VISIONS by Harlan Ellison is returning to print on March 26 with a stunning new cover! üìö‚ú® 

This anthology launched an entire sub-genre, New Wave science fiction, and has contributions from legendary authors like Robert Silverberg, Frederik Pohl, Philip K. Dick, and many more. 

Winner of multiple Hugo and Nebula awards, this collection of 33 powerful stories by 32 award-winning authors, continues to remain as relevant as it was when first published. üèÜüìñ 

Whether you're a long-time fan or discovering it for the first time, this new edition of DANGEROUS VISIONS is a must-have for your bookshelf. Preorder today (üîó in bio) and stay tuned for more Dangerous Visions with these upcoming releases: 
üëÄ DANGEROUS VISIONS (re-releasing March 26)
üëÄ AGAIN, DANGEROUS VISIONS (re-releasing June 4)
üëÄ THE LAST DANGEROUS VISIONS (releasing October 1)".
